headline: ESW Launches GovCon Accelerator™: A First-of-Its-Kind Framework for Secure, Compliance-Driven Microsoft 365 Deployments in GCC High
summary: NEW YORK, Oct. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ESW (eSoftware Associates), a seasoned Microsoft Partner known for secure collaboration, Intune, and Power Platform services in high-assurance environments, today announced the launch of its GovCon Accelerator™ — a modular, battle-tested framework designed to help government contractors deploy and operate Microsoft 365 in GCC High with confidence and compliance.
